title: Carter Meets with John (Person of Interest)(1 x 12)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: I prefer Joss Carter over Cookie any day.
I miss this show.  So much potential.

I love the dynamics between these two. Broke my heart into when they killed her off. She & John were great together no matter what the relationship was. It was hard to forgive them for killing off Carter.
I did not realize Reese was into her until the kiss.  However,  when I look back at this clip, I see it!
Here begins the fall of John for Joss. Soft looks, smirks and brushing hands from John.
description:
Carter meets with John to apologize for getting him shot, in response John gives her her first real number.

I do not own Person of Interest. All of its rights go to its creators and distributors.
